comment.text: This translation key is used to display the text "Download the app" on a download button within an application, encouraging users to initiate app installation. It appears in the UI as part of a styled link component, likely within a mobile app's deep linking functionality.

usage.context:
onClick={
 isOpenInAppOnly ? onDownloadAppClick : onStayBrowserClick
 }
 >
 {isOpenInAppOnly
 ? t("DeepLink:DownloadApp")
 : t("DeepLink:StayInBrowser")}
 </Link>
 </StyledActionsWrapper>
 </StyledDeepLink>
 </FormWrapper>
